extendedInfo.description: THIS APP HAS BEEN CREATED WITH SUUNTO's PERMISSION.Suunto Dive Computers allows users to view their Suunto scuba diving computer in action on their mobile device. It provides a way to thoroughly learn the operation of a Suunto dive computer in an exciting and interactive way. In addition to its class setting, Suunto Dive Computers is also a mobile reference if something is forgotten while on the go.This App includes native access to our online classes for Suunto model-specific dive computers and also launches the new iDive Computer simulator.The online classes are NOT free. To enroll in a class you need to purchase it via In App.Each DiveComputerTraining class is organized based on progressive learning and as such the user is recommended to follow the modules and sections in sequence. At the same time, the interactive organization of the class allows user to directly access a specific section for easier reference.A typical class will introduce the user to the dive computer, explain its indicators, review the settings step by step, show what to expect while underwater, and cover unexpected situations. Upon completion of the class, divers will feel more confident with their increased knowledge of their Suunto dive computer!

reviews.title: You have to pay (a lot) for the \"classes\" for each dive computer!
reviews.comment: They charge for each class and there is no simulated dive computer functionality without paying for one of the classes. Disappointing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NOT AN OFFICIAL SUUNTO PRODUCT
reviews.comment: This software is just a cover for iDive Computer, DivePAL and DveComputerTraining - all examples of rip off, half finished crap.  I doubt if Suunto actually know about this - I guess divenav is just ripping off their logo.  I would give zero stars if it were possible.  Is there somwhere on Google Play this type of rubbish can be reported to?  It should be deleted.  Utter Garbage
reviews.author: Paul A

reviews.title: Difficult
reviews.comment: The app is hard to use. It took a while to get it down. It also force closes quite a bit. Also, I\'ve never seen a company respond to user comments in such harsh, insulting ways. I used to love this company. Now, I\'m not so sure.
reviews.author: Adam Warrix

reviews.title: As a Suunto owner I am offended
reviews.comment: This really is the pits. Why not offer free resources for your customers. Are you aware there are other more competent dive computer manufacturers out there who understand pre-sales???
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app is a link generator.
reviews.comment: This app has no useable function other than generating links to paid classes. The description intimates that there are functions in it pertaining to dive computers for free, plus available classes for a fee. The class cost statement further reinforces this notion. Dive computer classes are available at most reputable dive shops for free. Please spare the world another classless, childish and unprofessional response. Face it your app is a bait and switch.
reviews.author: Tom S

reviews.title: I actually think this app could be dangerous
reviews.comment: Read you Suunto manual rather than this rubbish. Don\'t take any chances, read, understand, read again. Don\'t waste you time installing this.
reviews.author: Geoff Smith

reviews.title: This app sucks
reviews.comment: Do not download app poor quality not worth anybodys time or effort much better products out there worth getting then this crap
reviews.author: joshua fredericks

reviews.title: NOT free!!
reviews.comment: In-app charging for course content. 0 stars for the false advertising.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rip
reviews.comment: Another rip!! Makes you pay$6 for your model.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I was going to give this a shot... But....
reviews.comment: 1. No demos of how good the content really is.  2. The company gets abusive in response to negative feedback.    Why would I spend money on this company?
reviews.author: 3ric Johanson

reviews.title: Rip off
reviews.comment: Makes you pay for your model. Uninstall!
reviews.author: A Google User
